subject: Validate: CT-4 Build System Fixes (Partial Success)

content.self_validation_notes: PARTIAL SUCCESS: Dev server works (verified HTTP 200), page serves properly. Build still hangs due to provider chain complexity - this is architectural and doesn't block manual verification. Core mission (unblock CT-3) achieved.
content.remaining_issues: pnpm build hangs due to provider chain dependencies - recommend separate CT-5 for architectural fix
